content.question: What technique is used to create the art?

choices.label: Grains of colored rice are affixed to a canvas.
Different varieties of rice are arranged on a large tray.
Various types of rice are planted in the same field.
A base sculpture is coated with rice of different colors.

content.answer: Various types of rice are planted in the same field.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Make connections among cultural and interdisciplinary information provided in texts.
